document_notes.text:
This update for ppp fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2020-8597: Fixed a buffer overflow in the eap_request and eap_response functions (bsc#1162610).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: eap.c in pppd in ppp 2.4.2 through 2.4.8 has an rhostname buffer overflow in the eap_request and eap_response functions.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
